DOC.brief_title: Comparing Cervical Foley Catheter , Dinoprostone Combination Two Labor Induction
DOC.detailed_description: Introduction : Labor induction , iatrogenic initiation labor one common obstetric procedure perform nowadays . The rate induction labor double 1990 2010 9.6 % 23.8 % United State alone . There many method promote labor induction , include mechanical pharmacological method use alone conjugation . Choosing right method right patient challenging , limited information regard suitable effective approach cervical ripen labor induction . Out vast option cervical ripening , Foley catheter vaginal prostaglandin frequently use . To date , clinical trial compare different method evaluate effectiveness risk method . Two randomize control trial compare Foley catheter method vaginal dinoprostone method . In one study , Foley catheter find superior vaginal dinoprostone regard time delivery , whereas study difference find . In additional trial , Foley bulb vaginal Misoprostol compare Misoprostol alone . The first treatment result short time delivery . These find correlate previous trial either find difference superiority Misoprostol alone . A recent study compare Foley catheter PGE2 term oligohydramnios pregnancy show time delivery shorter PGE2 group . A meta-analysis compare Misoprostol dinoprostone show first effective , latter safer . Since obstetrics condition preeclampsia Intrauterine growth restriction ( IUGR ) expeditious induction labor may need , combination method may fasten induction delivery interval . A recent study present oral presentation society maternal fetal medicine month ago use combination Foley catheter prostaglandin induce labor . They find arm shorter induction delivery time serious side effect . In study , The investigator intend compare mechanical ( Foley catheter combine Oxytocin ) method , pharmacological one ( dinoprostone-PGE2 ) combination two method cervical ripen unfavorable cervix . The investigator also examine use two method tandem provide additive effect . The study include 3 group ; group 100 participant enrol , suit include exclude criterion . The investigator 200 induction per year primigravida woman . The investigator expect enroll 300 participant 2 year ' time . On enrollment patient receive number assign one three group . All participant assign 20 minute reassure monitor insertion device . A perineal US perform intervention evaluate Angle progression ( AOP ) , cervical length head position . Group 1 : Foley Oxytocin protocol The patient lie lithotomy position cover sterile sheet . A direct visualization cervix achieve sterile speculum , cervix sterilize iodine , patient allergic iodine `` septal- scrub '' use . The Foley insert internal cervical o , fill 80 ml normal saline , tap patient thigh gentle traction . An hour place Foley bulb , monitor perform . If less 3 contraction per 10 min interval appear monitor patient transfer delivery room Oxytocin administrate . If 3 contraction appear 10 min . interval , intervention personalize accord medical decision . The Foley catheter remove follow occur : 1 . Expulsion 2 . Non reassure fetal heart rate , NRFHR 3 . Tachysystole 4. spontaneous rupture membrane , SROM 5 . If 24 12 hour elapse since placement . Group 2 : Foley dinoprostone protocol . First Foley bulb place instruct . An hour place Foley bulb , monitor perform . If less 3 contraction per 10 min . interval appear monitor propess tape place posterior fornix . The patient leave recumbent 30 minute . One hour place dinoprostone , fetal monitor perform . If less 3 contraction per 10 min interval appear monitor patient remain observation monitor perform every 6 hour . If placing Foley bulb 3 contraction appear 10 minute interval patient exclude research intervention personalize accord medical decision Group 3 Dinoprostone protocol Dinoprostone remove freezer direct connection insertion . The patient lie lithotomy position . Dinoprostone insert posterior vaginal fornix use small amount water soluble lubricant accord manufactory protocol . The remind tap insert vagina . The patient leave recumbent 30 minute . An hour place dinoprostone , fetal monitor perform every 6 hour . If less 3 contraction per 10 min interval appear monitor patient transfer observation monitor perform every 6 hour . If 3 contraction appear 10 min . interval patient examine dilatation 3 cm transfer delivery room . The dinoprostone remove follow occur : 1 . NRFHR 2 . Tachysystole 3 . SROM 4 . If 24 hour elapse since placement In group , 24 hour since start study , bishop score still less 6 active labor initiate method ( study arm ) repeat . If second try cervix still unripe patient define failed induction .
DOC.criteria: Primiparous woman 37 week pregnant cephalic live singleton , intact membrane Unfavorable cervix ( bishop 's score 6 less ) Previous cesarean section uterine surgery severe IUGR severe preeclampsia Fetal malpresentation Multiple gestation Spontaneous labor ( 3 contraction 10 min ) Premature rupture membrane , PROM Category 2 great fetal heart rate trace Contraindication vaginal delivery Fever Vaginal bleeding ( spot bloody show ) Severe IUGR HIV carrier Sensitivity either latex PGE2 polyhydramnios
